Summary: bright red ball the size of a car in the atlantic ocean following me along beach
divs: Sighting Detailsbig glowing red sphere on top of the atlantic ocean 100 yards from jacksonville florida beach following me walking . then it plunged underneath the water , within a second it appeared in a different spot on top of the ocean . then it did a show . its movements was like a ball inside of a pin-ball machine . it would be at one point in the ocean , 1 second later vanish and appear 400 yards from the spot on top of the ocean where i first seen it . it continued these movements as whoever controlling it was playing or having fun . but i was scared because it was the size of a car and an intense bright red (glowing) the entire craft was a huge ball (SPHERE) OF RED ENERGY LIGHT AND I WAS BY MYSELF WALKING ON JACKSONVILLE FLORIDA BEACH IN THE DARK . THEN AFTER IT DID THE STRANGE SHOW , IT WAS STATIONARY ABOUT 14 BLOCKS ON THE BEACH OUT FROM THE OCEAN . OUT OF COURIOSITY I WALKED OFF THE BEACH ON THE FIRST ROAD PARRALELL TO THE OCEAN TOWARDS IT TO SEE "WTF" IT WAS . I WAS GOING TO GO NEAR THE OBJECT. BUT AS I WAS WALKING CLOSER TO IT I HESITATED , HAVING AN UNPREDICTABLE FEELING IF I WALKED TO CLOSE TO IT WHAT MIGHT HAPPEN TO ME . SO BEING SCARED I WALKED AWAY NOT LOOKING BACK AT THE RED GLOWING BALL OBJECT.
